valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 19 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 20 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Fastnet 1007 losing its identity. New low expected Shannon 987 by 0600 tomorrow

Wind
In northeast, southerly or southeasterly 6 or 7. In southwest, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In northeast, moderate or rough. in southwest, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough later.

In northeast, occasional rain. In southwest, rain, fog patches.
Visibility
In northeast, good, occasionally poor. In southwest, moderate occasionally very poor, becoming good later.
